name: Fusion (itch) (Aidan Strong)
description:
Made in 48 Hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Fusion is a galaga inspired, bullet hell centered around controlling two different heads of a machine. One head "eats" bullets for the other one to shoot back out at enemies. 

How long can you survive?

Features:

- Endless Waves

- A Retro Neon Aesthetic

Developers:

Aaron Isara

Aidan Strong
